$WmMPID_冬祭アスレイ,ch08_26_Asley_M_Winter21,Face|I hear tell you're an artist, Ignatz. Is
that so?$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭イグナーツ,ch17_22_Ignats_M_Winter21,Face|I like to think so. In fact, I'd love to
paint this beautiful landscape. Askr is
so picturesque in the snow.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭アスレイ,ch08_26_Asley_M_Winter21,Face|An excellent idea. If you'd have it, I'd
be happy to offer my critique. In fact,
it would be an honor.$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_冬祭イグナーツ,ch17_22_Ignats_M_Winter21,Face|The crisp air, the still snow, the
quiet trees... This is truly the most
blessed of nights.$k$p$WmMPID_冬祭アスレイ,ch08_26_Asley_M_Winter21,Face|It is indeed. Although...what's that?
There's some sort of commotion over
there. We should go investigate.$k$p$Sbs150|
